pages.text: Enemies in the world of Requiem are much stronger and smarter than their vanilla counterparts.$(br2)Rarely, an enemy will be granted an exceptional increase to its power and abilities. These enemies give great rewards when killed.

When you die all of your items will be suspended by an eye in your place of death, hit it to retrieve them.$(br2)However, if you die again before harvesting your eye, all items inside of it will be dropped to the ground.
